title: Is Alaska gonna pay you $2,000 so you don't leave the state?
subtitle: Mimi's partial accuracy claimed that Alaska would pay you over $2,000 not to move away, provided that you lived there 190 days a year and not a criminal.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: All Alaskans living in the state 190 days a year who are not criminals receive $2,000 a year.
